channel.title: CVE Feed for gVectors Team -- wpForo Forum
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gVectors Team -- wpForo Forum

item.title: CVE-2022-38055|2024-08-03T10:45:52.012Z -- gvectors%20team -- wpforo%20forum
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in gVectors Team wpForo Forum allows Content Spoofing.This issue affects wpForo Forum: from n/a through 2.0.9.
